sentence.Network_en: I know this is an imposition. But please hear me out.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道这是强人所难。但是请听我说完。

sentence.Network_en: She felt the journey to be an unwelcome imposition on her time.
sentence.Network_cn: 她觉得行程占用了她的时间,心中颇为不快.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin impositio(n-), from the verb imponere (see impose)

entry.def: If you impose something on people, you use your authority to force them to accept it.

example.ex: Britain imposed fines on airlines which bring in passengers without proper papers...
example.tran: 英国会对运载证件不齐全的乘客进入国内的航空公司课以罚款。

example.ex: Many companies have imposed a pay freeze...
example.tran: 许多公司已经强制冻结了工资。

entry.def: If you impose your opinions or beliefs on other people, you try and make people accept them as a rule or as a model to copy.

example.ex: Parents of either sex should beware of imposing their own tastes on their children.
example.tran: 父母双方都应切记不要把自己的喜好强加给孩子。

entry.tran: 使遭受，使承受(压力、痛苦等)
entry.def: If something imposes strain, pressure, or suffering on someone, it causes them to experience it.

example.ex: The filming imposed an additional strain on her.
example.tran: 拍摄任务使她承受了格外大的压力。

example.ex: ...the pressures imposed upon teachers by ceaseless curriculum reforms.
example.tran: 无休止的课程改革使教师承受的压力

entry.tran: 把…硬加给;把…强塞给;勉强(某人)做事
entry.def: If someone imposes on you, they unreasonably expect you to do something for them which you do not want to do.

example.ex: I was afraid you'd simply feel we were imposing on you...
example.tran: 我担心你会觉得我们是在勉强你。

example.ex: 'Mum thinks I should stop imposing on your hospitality, Leo,' said Grace.
example.tran: “利奥,我妈妈觉得我不应该再在这儿麻烦你了，”格雷丝说。

entry.def: If someone imposes themselves on you, they force you to accept their company although you may not want to.

example.ex: I didn't want to impose myself on my married friends.
example.tran: 我不想打扰自己已婚的朋友。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of imposing something (as a tax or an embargo)

auth_sentence.res_content: The imposition of centrally driven regulation was well-meaning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The imposition of centrally driven regulation was well-meaning.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强动作+posit放+e→放得好→适当的
com共同+posit放+e→放到一起→混合物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 肯定的,积极的,绝对的,无疑的,正的
stems_affixes.word_buile: posit放+ive……的→确定"放"→肯定的,积极的,主动的
ap加强+posit放+ion表名词→放在一起→并置
com共同+posit放+e→放到一起→混合物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保管人,受托人,受托公司,存放处,储藏所,仓库
stems_affixes.word_buile: deposit存放+ary人,物或场所→n.保管人,受托人,受托公司,存放处,储藏所,仓库
de下去+posit放+ion表名词→放下去,沉淀

stems_affixes.value_cn: 排列,部署;性格倾向;倾向,意向
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+posit放+ion表名词→分开放→安排→引申为人的喜好,心情
ex出+posit放+ion表名词→放出去,暴露
im进去+posit放+ion表名词→进去放[强放]→强加接受

stems_affixes.value_cn: 位置;职位;姿势,姿态;见解,立场,形势
stems_affixes.word_buile: posit放+ion表名词→放置的地方→位置;职位

stems_affixes.value_cn: 主张, 建议, 陈述, 命题
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro赞同+position见解,立场→赞同……见解,立场→主张, 建议

stems_affixes.value_cn: 贮藏室,智囊团,知识库,仓库
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+posit放+ory场所,范围→重新[不断]放东西的地方→仓库

means.word_mean: 过分的要求,不合理的负担

sentences.en: Several reasons were put forward to justify the imposition of censorship.
sentences.cn: 举出了几条理由来证明实行审查是不合理的。

sentences.en: She felt the journey to be an unwelcome imposition on her time.
sentences.cn: 她觉得行程占用了她的时间，心中颇为不快。

sentences.en: resisting the imposition of VAT on fuel
